Name: esophageal lipoma
Definition: A lipoma that is an asymptomatic

Name: esophageal atresia
Definition: A muscular disease that is located_in the diaphragm.

Name: esophagitis
Definition: A Trichomonas vaginalis trichomoniasis that involves inflammation of the urinary bladder caused by Trichomonas vaginalis. The symptoms include pain during urination

Name: obsolete Histoplasma capsulatum retinitis
Definition: An American histoplasmosis that results_in inflammation located_in retina

Name: esophageal candidiasis
Definition: A candidiasis that involves fungal infection of the esophagus by Candida albicans in immunocompromised people

Name: esophageal diverticulosis
Definition: An aspergillosis that involves an allergic reaction due to the spores of Aspergillus moulds (A. fumigatus)

Name: megaesophagus
Definition: An aspergillosis that involves an allergic reaction due to the spores of Aspergillus moulds (A. fumigatus)

Name: esophageal cancer
Definition: A gastrointestinal system cancer that is located_in the esophagus.
Synonym: malignant tumor of the middle Third of the esophagus

Name: esophageal tuberculosis
Definition: A gastrointestinal tuberculosis that involves formation of tuberculous ulcers located_in esophagus. The infection has_symptom dysphagia

Name: esophageal leukoplakia
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the larynx.

Name: achalasia
Definition: An esophageal disease that is characterized by an inability of the esophagus to move food toward the stomach resulting from the lower esophogeal sphincter not fully relaxing during swallowing.
Synonym: Lack of reflex relaxation of lower oesophageal sphincter

Name: dyskinesia of esophagus
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection caused by the amoeba Entamoeba histolytica. Amebic invasion of the intestinal lining causes dysentery

Name: obsolete Herpes simplex virus keratitis
Definition: A Simplexvirus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in cornea of the eye

Name: obsolete Sezary's disease involving intrathoracic lymph nodes
Definition: A Simplexvirus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in cornea of the eye
Synonym: Szary's disease of intrathoracic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: obsolete cataplexy and narcolepsy
Definition: A Simplexvirus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in cornea of the eye
Synonym: Szary's disease of intrathoracic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: Barrett's esophagus
Definition: A lichen disease that is located_in skin

Name: esophagus squamous cell papilloma
Definition: A brain disease that is characterized as an acute inflammation of the brain with flu-like symptoms.

Name: esophagus leiomyoma
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection located_in intestine caused by eating food contaminated with enterotoxins produced by bacteria
